title: Master of Science
text: Currently pursuing a Master of Science in User Experience at Arizona State University, where I’m expanding my skills in user research, design systems, and usability testing. My studies focus on understanding how people interact with technology and how thoughtful design can improve accessibility, communication, and everyday life.

title: Bachelor of Applied Science
text: I graduated Magna Cum Laude with a 3.71 GPA from Arizona State University with a Bachelor of Applied Science in Internet and Web Development. The program built a strong foundation in front-end development, user-centered design, and digital strategy—integrating design, technology, and business to create effective, user-friendly web experiences.

title: Associate in Applied Science
text: I earned an Associate in Applied Science (AAS) in Web Design from Mesa Community College with a 3.8 GPA. The program provided hands-on experience in designing, building, and managing interactive websites—developing my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, UX/UI, SEO, and content management systems while emphasizing best practices and effective project management.
